Package: sk.hax.software.os

[Java] Interface OutboundChannel

    • sk.hax.software.os.OutboundChannel
    • All Superinterfaces:
      Callbackable

      Base interface for asynchronous and synchronous channels. Allows publishing outgoing data wrapped in a datagram. Also contains the method to close the channel and free resources occupied by it.

      Authors:
      mio

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          void close()
          Close the channel, freeing up resources occupied by it.
          int getSourcePort()
          Get the port to which the channel is attached.
          void publish(Datagram datagram)
          Send the specified datagram out to the network using this channel.

      • Inherited Methods Summary

          Inherited Methods 
          Methods inherited from class Name
          interface Callbackable callback

      • Method Detail

        • public void close()

          Close the channel, freeing up resources occupied by it. After this, the channel will no longer receive and be unable to send any further data.

        • public int getSourcePort()

          Get the port to which the channel is attached.

          Returns:
          port to which the channel is attached

        • public void publish(Datagram datagram)

          Send the specified datagram out to the network using this channel.

          Parameters:
          datagram - datagram to send
